title: Influence on the properties of TMCs of ceramic and intermetallic composite reinforcements (B<sub>4</sub>C, Ti<sub>x</sub>Al<sub>y</sub> and Ti<sub>x</sub>Si<sub>y</sub>) fabricated by inductive hot pressing
